purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of characterization views of a version of a system.
The second edition of this part of ISO 10303 incorporates the modifications to the first edition listed below.
No ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been added.
No ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been modified.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations and interface specifications have been removed.
In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: identification of a characterization of a version of a system, relevant in one or more application domains and one or more life-cycle stages.
